https://movielabs.com/omc/Asset/Asset.title: Asset
https://movielabs.com/omc/Asset/Asset.description: A physical or digital object or collection of objects specific to the creation of the Creative Work.

name.title: Asset name
name.description: A human readable name for the asset

description.title: Asset description
description.description: A human readable description of the asset

assetInfo.title: Asset Information
assetInfo.description: Properties describing the instance of this asset including version, provenance, variant

Asset.title: Asset Group
Asset.description: The set of Assets that make up an an asset group and has a structuralType of 'AssetGroup

customData.title: Custom Data
customData.description: A user defined set of custom data in the payload of the instance, used where the formal schema lacks required properties

entityInfo.title: Entity Info
entityInfo.description: A set of properties that describe this specific instance of the entity

schemaVersion.title: Schema Version
schemaVersion.description: The version number of the schema in use for this instance

createdBy.title: Created by
createdBy.description: The Participant responsible for the original creation of the entity

note.title: Notes
note.description: Arbitary note or comments about the entity

https://movielabs.com/omc/Participant/Pa.title: Participant
https://movielabs.com/omc/Participant/Pa.description: The entities (people, organizations, and services) that are responsible for the production of the Creative Work.

name.title: Participant name
name.description: A human readable name for the participant, primarily for use as a label

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the participant

Role.description: A group of Roles this Participant can perform

https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/identi.title: identifier
https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/identi.description: An identifier uniquely identifies an entity within a particular scope.

identifierScope.title: Identifier Scope
identifierScope.description: The universe within which an identifier is valid and unique.

identifierValue.title: Identifier Value
identifierValue.description: A string of characters that uniquely identifies an object within a particular scope.

https://movielabs.com/omc/Participant/Ro.title: Role
https://movielabs.com/omc/Participant/Ro.description: A set of properties that define the role of a participant within the production

https://movielabs.com/omc/Task/Task.title: Task
https://movielabs.com/omc/Task/Task.description: A piece of work to be done and completed as a step in the production process.

Role.description: The set of Participants that jointly comprise this Participant

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: Context
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: Informs scope within the construction process of a Creative Work.

name.title: Asset name
name.description: A human readable name for the context

description.title: Context Description
description.description: A brief description of the context

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: Narrative Scene
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: Taken from the narrative itself and traditionally defined by creative intent and typically a unity of time, place, action, or theme.

sceneName.title: Narrative Scene Name
sceneName.description: A human readable name for the scene

fullName.title: Scene full name
fullName.description: A full descriptive name for the scene

altName.title: Scene alternate name
altName.description: An alternate, often shorter, name used in applications to identify the scens

description.title: Narrative Scene Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative scene

slugline.title: Slugline
slugline.description: The slugline for the scene from the script. Multiple sluglines, or a breakdown of a slugline may be recorded as indivdual notes

sceneNumber.title: Scene Number
sceneNumber.description: A number used in the script to refer to the scene

https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/note.title: Note
https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/note.description: An arbitary note or comment pertaining to the entity

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for the note or annotation

text.title: Text
text.description: The text of the note or annotation

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: Character
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: A sentient entity (usually a person but not always) in the script whose specific identity is consequential to the narrative. A Character is generally identified by a specific name.

name.title: Asset name
name.description: The primary name used for the character

description.title: Character Description
description.description: A brief description of the character

characterName.title: Character Name
characterName.description: Detailed name, may include titles, alternate names, prefixes and suffixes

physicalCharacteristics.title: Physical Characteristics
physicalCharacteristics.description: Allows for the the description of certain physical characteristics on a character, things that might be useful to an art department, wardrobe or casting for example.

species.title: Species
species.description: A species to which this character belongs

hairColor.title: Hair Color
hairColor.description: The hair color of the character

hairLength.title: Hair Length
hairLength.description: The length of hair of the character

eyeColor.title: Eye Color
eyeColor.description: The color of the characters eyes

https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/comple.title: completeName
https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/comple.description: A set if name types, that can be used together or alone

firstGivenName.title: First Given Name
firstGivenName.description: A person's first name, also referred to as given name

secondGivenName.title: Second Given Name
secondGivenName.description: A persons second given name, also referred to as middle name

familyName.title: Family Name
familyName.description: A persons family name, also referred to as surname

fullName.title: Full Name
fullName.description: A complete name, typically a conjunction of familyName, firstGivenName and possibly other fields.

birthName.title: Birth Name
birthName.description: A persons name at birth, also referred to as maiden name

primaryName.title: Primary Name
primaryName.description: A persons primary name, one they typically use, also often a combination of first, second and family name

alias.title: Alias
alias.description: An alias being used by a person often used to disguse someones real identity, sometimes used when booking hotel rooms or restaurants

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: A prefix that can indicate a persons gender or title

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: A suffix, often used to indicate a title or classification

linearDistance.title: Linear Distance
linearDistance.description: Encode a measurment of distance using the imperial or metric system

weight.title: weight
weight.description: Encode a measurment of weight using the imperial or metric system

dimensions.title: dimensions
dimensions.description: Encode a set of measurments to describe a 2 or 3 dimensional object (metric, imperial or pixels)

height.description: The height or X axis of the object

width.description: The width or X axis of the object

depth.description: The depth or Z axis of the object

metricDistance.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millilmeter

imperialDistance.description: Encode distance using the imperial system of measurment (miles, feet, inches)

pixels.description: Encode a measurement of the number of pixels, typically in a digital image

metricWeight.description: Encode weight using the metric system of measurement (kilogram, gram)

imperialWeight.description: Encode weight using the imperial system of measurment (pounds, oounces)

https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/gender.description: Describe an individual, person or characters, gender
https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/gender.title: gender

gender.title: Identifies as gender
gender.description: The gender by which an individual identifies

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: Narrative Prop
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: A named object related to or interacting with characters that is implied or understood to be necessary for the narrative, a Narrative Prop is one implied by the narrative.

name.title: Narrative Prop Name
name.description: A human readable name for the prop

description.title: Narrative Prop Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative prop

propType.title: Prop type
propType.description: A departmental catagorization for the prop.

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: Narrative Set Dressing
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: Objects used on set to create and enhance the environment

name.title: Narrative Set Dressing Name
name.description: A human readable name for the set dressing

description.title: Narrative Set Dressing Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative set dressing

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: Narrative Wardrobe
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: The clothing for a Character in the narrative.

name.title: Narrative Wardrobe Name
name.description: A human readable name for the narrative wardrobe

description.title: Narrative Wardrobe Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative wardrobe

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: ProductionLocation
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: A real place that is used to depict the Narrative Location or used for creating the production.

name.title: Production Location Name
name.description: A human readable name for the location

description.title: Production Location Description
description.description: A brief description of the production location

locationType.description: Describes whether this is production location or more specifically a shooting location

https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/Locati.title: Location
https://movielabs.com/omc/Utility/Locati.description: A particular place or position either in either the real world or the narrative world.

name.title: Location name
name.description: A human readable name for the location

description.title: Location Description
description.description: A brief description of the location

locality.title: Address locality
locality.description: The locality in which the street address is, and which is in the region.

region.title: Address region
region.description: The region in which the locality is, and which is in the country

country.title: Country
country.description: The country, as an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

coordinates.title: GPS coordinates
coordinates.description: A global positioning coordinate in compliance with WGS 84

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: Sequence
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: A sequence of shots linked to creative intent.

name.title: Sequence Name
name.description: A human readable name for the sequence

description.title: Sequence Description
description.description: A brief description of the sequence

SCD.title: Sequence Chronology Descriptor
SCD.description: Describes how a series of Shots is used to generate a Sequence

workingTitle.title: Creative Work Working Title
workingTitle.description: The working title of the work

officialTitle.title: Creative Work Official Title
officialTitle.description: The offical title of the work

internalTitle.title: Creative Work Internal Title
internalTitle.description: The internal title of the work

description.title: Creative Work Description
description.description: A brief description of the creative work

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: NarrativeLocation
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: A location specified or implied by the narrative.

name.title: Narrative Location Name
name.description: A human readable name for the location

description.title: Narrative Location Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative location

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: Slate
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: Used to capture key identifying information about what is being recorded on any given setup and take.

productionScene.title: Production Scene
productionScene.description: A group of Participants responsible for shooting some element of a Scene, e.g., a Main Unit or Second Unit.

cameraLabel.title: Camera Label
cameraLabel.description: Label for the Camera responsible for the Capture, usually related to the role and responsibility of the group operating it and usually a single upper-case letter starting with A.

cameraUnit.title: Camera Unit
cameraUnit.description: A group of Participants responsible for shooting some element of a Scene, e.g., a Main Unit or Second Unit.

cameraRoll.title: Camera Roll
cameraRoll.description: Identifier for a group of events captured together on the same camera on the same media.

soundRoll.title: Sound Roll
soundRoll.description: Identifier for a group of audio events captured together on the same recording device and same media.

shootDay.title: Shoot Day
shootDay.description: The number of the day on the shooting schedule.

recordingFPS.title: Recording FPS
recordingFPS.description: Frames per second recorded by the camera.

eventInTime.title: Event in Time
eventInTime.description: Describes a specific event that occurred

https://movielabs.com/omc/Participant/Pa.title: Participant Structural Characteristics
https://movielabs.com/omc/Participant/Pa.description: A set of Structural Characteristics for Participants

jobTitle.title: Job Title
jobTitle.description: A persons job title (as distinct from a specific role)

https://movielabs.com/omc/Participant/Pa.title: Participant Functional Characteristics
https://movielabs.com/omc/Participant/Pa.description: A set of Functional Characteristics for Participants

name.title: Name
name.description: A name used to describe what this Participant does, often a job title

description.title: Description
description.description: A brisf description of what this Participant does on the production

https://movielabs.com/omc/Asset/assetSC.title: Asset Structural Characteristics
https://movielabs.com/omc/Asset/assetSC.description: Describes the form of an Asset along with attributes specific to that Asset's form

identifier.description: Identifies the essence of the asset

structuralType.title: Structural Type
structuralType.description: A structured description of the the assets form

representation.title: Representation
representation.description: Describes a specific representation of the asset

structuralProperties.title: Structural Properties
structuralProperties.description: A set of properties that describe the asset in this form

$defs.title: Structural Properties
$defs.description: A set of properties that describe attributes specific to the Asset

assetGroup.title: Asset Group
assetGroup.description: An Asset that is comprised of other Assets or Asset Groups and treated as a single unit

isOrdered.title: Assets are ordered
isOrdered.description: True when the Assets in the group are ordered

fileDetails.title: File Details
fileDetails.description: Properties relating to how an asset may be used in file system

fileExtension.title: File Extension
fileExtension.description: The file extension for the asset, often a 3 or 4 letter code that typically indicates the encoding format

sourceReference.title: Source Reference
sourceReference.description: A set of terms that describe the source of the image, such as url, the name of publication, stock library etc.

format.title: Image format
format.description: The format the image is available in

https://movielabs.com/omc/Asset/assetFC.title: Asset Functional Characteristics
https://movielabs.com/omc/Asset/assetFC.description: A set of Functional Characteristics for Assets

functionalType.title: Functional Type
functionalType.description: A description (typically from a controlled vocabulary of the asset function, or what it is used for

functionalProperties.title: Functional Properties
functionalProperties.description: A set of properties that describe properties specific to particular Assets types

https://movielabs.com/omc/Infrastructure.description: The underlying systems and framework required for the production of the Creative Work; it is generally not specific to a particular Creative Work.
https://movielabs.com/omc/Infrastructure.title: Infrastructure

name.title: Infrastructure name
name.description: A human readable name for the infrastructure

description.title: Infrastructure description
description.description: A human readable description of the infrastructure

https://movielabs.com/omc/Infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Structural Characteristics
https://movielabs.com/omc/Infrastructure.description: Describes the form of the infrastructure along with attributes specific to the form

structuralType.title: Structural Type
structuralType.description: A structured description of the an infrastructures form

structuralProperties.title: Infrastructure Structural Properties
structuralProperties.description: A set of properties that describe properties specific to particular infrastructure types

https://movielabs.com/omc/Infrastructure.title: Asset Functional Characteristics
https://movielabs.com/omc/Infrastructure.description: A set of Functional Characteristics for Assets

functionalType.title: Functional Type
functionalType.description: A description (typically from a controlled vocabulary of the infrastructures function, or what it is used for

functionalProperties.title: Infrastructure Functional Properties
functionalProperties.description: A set of properties that describe properties specific to particular infrastructure types

https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.title: ProductionScene
https://movielabs.com/omc/MediaCreationC.description: Defined either by explicit divisions in the structure of the Script, e.g., by a Slugline, or by additional capture for use in the Creative Work that is not tied to any particular Scene in the Script.

name.title: Asset name
name.description: A human readable name for the production scene

description.title: Asset description
description.description: A human readable description of the production scene

sceneDescriptor.title: Scene Descriptor
sceneDescriptor.description: An alphanumeric reference to a Production Scene

sceneNumber.title: Scene Number
sceneNumber.description: A number tied to a Slugline when a Script is locked
